subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: LaVine, of the Minnesota Timberwolves, was the favorite before the contest and delivered a series of creative dunks, at one point wearing Jordan’s jersey from “Space Jam.”
snippet: LaVine, of the Minnesota Timberwolves, was the favorite before the contest and delivered a series of creative dunks, at one point wearing Jordan’s jersey from “Space Jam.”
